results.title: Control Multiplayer Game Officially Revealed in First Gameplay Trailer With the Title FBC: Firebreak
results.description: New three-player co-op game will cast you as first responders from the FBC battling paranatural enemies.Remedy's new multiplayer game set in the Control universe has been fully revealed for the first time under the name FBC: Firebreak.
